last_episode_to_air.name: Seeking Our Forever
last_episode_to_air.overview: Garrick's potential sister wife Mariam sends mixed signals. Nathalia expresses her feelings clearly. After Jasmine's sleepover, the Davises face a major decision.

name: Seeking Sister Wife
overview: Explore the lives of three families all in various phases of seeking, dating or transitioning a new sister wife into their lives. They will date online, date in person and explore the ins and outs of incorporating a new wife into their plural families.

episodes.name: Are Three Wives Better Than One?
episodes.overview: The Brineys, Snowdens and Alldredges are in various stages of seeking a sister wife; with the arrival of their third wife, the Brineys all move under one roof; after a breakup, the Snowdens begin their search; the Alldredges seek a third.

episodes.name: Risky Business
episodes.overview: After meeting someone online, the Snowdens worry about how their family will respond; the Alldredges decide whether or not to move forward with Melina; the Brineys adjust to their new wife with impending legal issues.

episodes.name: Three's Company or Three's Crowd
episodes.overview: The Alldredges and Snowdens hope to finally meet their online potential sister wives face to face; tensions grow among the Briney sister wives, April and Auralee, and Angela Briney wonders what she has gotten herself into.

episodes.name: 13 is Enough!
episodes.overview: April and Drew Briney celebrate a milestone anniversary while Angela and Auralee tend to the children; the Snowdens forge ahead with potential sister wife Joselyn; the Alldredges regroup after Melina doesn’t show up and focus on Vanessa’s pregnancy.

episodes.name: Too Much Wrong, and Not Enough Right...
episodes.overview: Vanessa's pregnancy is in jeopardy and she faces a life threatening surgery. The Snowdens meet up with Joselyn to see if she will come clean about sleeping with Dimitri. The Brineys go camping in hopes of easing the tension amongst the three wives.

episodes.name: Blast From the Past
episodes.overview: The Alldredges' world is rocked by an unexpected phone call. Ashley Snowden proposes a new potential sister wife. The Brineys get some shocking news that threatens to tear them apart.

episodes.name: Plural Lives Equals Happy Wives?
episodes.overview: April struggles with leaving Utah and threatens to tear the Briney family apart; the Snowdens decide whether to forge ahead with potential sister wife Jakira; the Alldredges find out Melina's decision.

episodes.name: It's Time to Start Seeking Again!
episodes.overview: The Snowdens and the Alldredges court a new sister wife; elsewhere, young newlyweds, the Winders, still have a plural marriage in secret; the McGees seek their first sister wife.

episodes.name: Failure to Launch
episodes.overview: Vanessa experiences life as a Snowden; the McGees tell their sons they want to seek a sister wife; the Winders go out in public as a trio for the first time; the Alldredges wonder if their potential sister wife, Jennifer, will show up on their date.

episodes.name: Coming Out Plural
episodes.overview: The Alldredges’ potential sister wife throws their courtship off track; Vanesa throws a curve ball at Dimitri on their date; the McGees move out of their camper for more space and privacy; the Winders take a public stand for their plural lifestyle.

episodes.name: Unforeseen Circumstances
episodes.overview: Surprises are in store when Jeff tells his wives about Jennifer's abrupt exit; Dimitri decides to introduce Vanessa to Ashley's mother without telling her; the McGees video chat with a potential sister wife; Sophie Winder's family visits.

episodes.name: Thou Shall Not Sext
episodes.overview: The McGees set ground rules for courting and intimacy and ask a potential sister wife to meet in-person; the Winders launch their online dating profile; the Snowdens decide to make a move that could impact Vanessa's life in a serious way.

episodes.name: The Waiting Game ...
episodes.overview: The Snowdens arrive in LA and hope their relationship with Vanessa will still work under one roof; the McGees nervously prep for Brandy's arrival; the Alldredges ask Jennifer to come for a visit; the Winders find a possible interest online.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner?
episodes.overview: Vanessa and her sister clash over her choice to join a polygamist lifestyle; the Alldredges prepare for Jennifer's visit until Jeff gets a strange text message.

episodes.name: Don't Go Breaking My Heart
episodes.overview: A series following three families in various phases of adding a new sister wife to their lives.

episodes.name: It's Getting Steamy Up In Here!
episodes.overview: The Alldredges are shocked by Jennifer's mysterious behavior while the Winders finally video chat with a potential sister wife. Paige questions if this lifestyle is what she really wants, and the Snowdens prepare for Dimitri and Vanessa to be intimate.

episodes.name: One Wedding and a Funeral?
episodes.overview: The Snowdens look toward the future after Dimitri and Vanessa become intimate, but Ashley surprises them with some news; Brandy reunites with the McGees; the Alldredges are shocked by the latest Jennifer news; the Winders discuss their future.

episodes.name: The Snowdens Say We Do!
episodes.overview: Ashley and Dimitri Snowden are just a few days away from marrying Vanessa, but when their three families with their three big personalities all get together, everything can go wrong.

episodes.name: Tell All
episodes.overview: The Alldredges, Snowdens, McGees, and Winders all meet for the first time to answer tough questions about each of their journeys in plural dating and take a deep dive together into the season’s juiciest moments.

episodes.name: Polygamist And Proud!
episodes.overview: The Snowdens have a new girlfriend; the Merrifields take drastic measures to bring their Brazilian bombshell fiancee into their family; after their first wife left, the Joneses are ready to seek again; the Clarks have turmoil in their plural kingdom.

episodes.name: Irreconcilable Differences
episodes.overview: Tosha makes a bold confession to her mom. Despite their family's concern, The Merrifields forge ahead with their plans for potential sister wife Roberta. Vanessa and Kaleh clash over their differences. The Snowdens' new girlfriend reveals a secret.

episodes.name: I Gotta Have Faith
episodes.overview: The Merrifields head to Mexico to reunite with fiancee Roberta. The plot thickens as the Snowdens reveal a new twist in their world. Rather than search online, the Joneses go out on the town. Life in the Winder home is looking very different these days...

episodes.name: Emotions and Commotions
episodes.overview: The Snowdens welcome a new girlfriend! The Merrifields scout wedding venues with Roberta, leaving Dannielle to feel like a third wheel. The Clarks work on their relationship with explosive results. The Winders' family members question their lifestyle.

episodes.name: Sharing Is Caring
episodes.overview: Roberta makes a shocking confession to Dannielle. The Joneses navigate dating during the pandemic. The Clarks try to make sense of everything that happened with Kaleh. The Snowdens continue to get to know Tayler and wonder if she might be the one.

episodes.name: Got To Be Real
episodes.overview: Sister wife Roberta gives Garrick an ultimatum. The Snowdens make a big decision about their potential sister wife Tayler. The Joneses prefer to meet people in person but set up an online dating profile to try something new. Sophie Winder goes into labor.

episodes.name: Miss You Much
episodes.overview: Chrissy returns to LA just before the shutdown and meets Tayler for the first time. The Merrifields say a tearful goodbye to Bert. The Winders debate if they're ready for Kimberley to visit. The Clarks' relationship with Kaleh is tested during quarantine.

episodes.name: Full House
episodes.overview: Tensions rise for the Snowdens as the new family of nine is forced to quarantine under one roof! The Joneses video chat with a new potential sister wife. The Winders prepare for Kimberley's visit. Jarod Clark finds unexpected chemistry with a friend.

episodes.name: You Dropped A Bomb On Me
episodes.overview: Danielle questions Garrick as her insecurities with Roberta intensify. The Winders hope sparks will fly during potential sister wife Kimberley's visit. The Clarks get an unexpected bomb drop on their date with Emily. Sidian goes on a solo date!

episodes.name: Deeper And Deeper
episodes.overview: The Merrifields receive some unexpected news from Roberta, while the Snowdens consider the future with Chrissy. The Winders deepen their bond with Kimberley. The Clarks meet a new potential sister wife. Sidian reveals details from his date with Alexandra.

episodes.name: Can't Fight This Feeling
episodes.overview: Dimitri plans a special surprise for Chrissy. The Merrifields reunite with Bert in Mexico, but tensions flare as things get real. The Winders discuss courting Kimberley. The Clarks question their seeking journey. The Joneses have a rough night with Alex.

episodes.name: One Nation
episodes.overview: The Snowdens are set to marry Chrissy, but will her family in South Africa object to this polygamous union? Garrick shares some unexpected news as Danielle grapples with the reality of Roberta actively trying to get pregnant and move to the US.

episodes.name: Who Doesn't Like Thirds?
episodes.overview: The Davises and the Foleys each navigate their way through the many trials and tribulations of polygamy with the ultimate goal of bringing in a new sister wife.

episodes.name: Little Do They Know
episodes.overview: The Merrifields court Lea despite Roberta's disapproval.

episodes.name: Can’t Clip These Wings
episodes.overview: The Merrifields encounter some red flags as they bond with Lea.

episodes.name: Three's a Crowd
episodes.overview: Brenda feels more like a third wheel than a sister wife.

episodes.name: Do You Have Condoms?
episodes.overview: The Davises take Danielle on a trip to see how she gels with the group.

episodes.name: A Distant Dream
episodes.overview: Steve's daughter slams the Foleys for their plural lifestyle. Sidian meets Arielle for the first time. The Merrifields focus on getting wife-to-be Roberta to the US. The Davises learn some news about Danielle's past relationships that gives them pause.

episodes.name: Roses Are Red, But Not on the Bed!
episodes.overview: The Merrifields move into a new house as doubt looms about Roberta. The Epps are divided on sex and dating. Sidian worries if Arielle is the one to join their family. Danielle is taken aback when she learns what is required of her to join the Davises.

episodes.name: I'm in Love With Your Big Brain
episodes.overview: Brenda meets with April to help improve their communication.

episodes.name: You Want All the Juicy Details?
episodes.overview: Dannielle feels Garrick and Roberta should not try for a baby until she's in Colorado.

episodes.name: So Many Things Could Go Wrong
episodes.overview: The Merrifields visit Brazil to figure out Roberta's delay in coming to the U.S..

episodes.name: Brazil or Bust
episodes.overview: The Merrifields worry that Roberta's mum may not approve of her coming to the US.

episodes.name: An Emotional Rollercoaster
episodes.overview: The Merrifields book Bert's ticket to the U.S.

episodes.name: No Kiss Friends
episodes.overview: The Merrifields have a problem when Roberta learns the truth about Garrick and Lea.

episodes.name: Mr. and Mrs. and Mrs. ... and Mrs.
episodes.overview: After their trip to Brazil to visit sister wife-to-be Roberta, the Merrifields eagerly prepare for her arrival. The Davises hope everything goes according to plan as they put together a commitment ceremony to celebrate their union with Danielle.

episodes.name: Seeking Can Be a Shock
episodes.overview: Trying to move past their breakup with Roberta, the Merrifields dive back into dating.

episodes.name: Seeking Danielle Davis
episodes.overview: Tensions run high when Shane meets Grace for the first time.

episodes.name: Seeking Something Real
episodes.overview: The Merrifields' trip to Mexico takes an unexpected turn.

episodes.name: Seeking the Truth
episodes.overview: Nathalia worries Dannielle is hesitant about adding a wife and Ashley Sherwood meets with a new potential sister-wife.

episodes.name: Seeking Can Be Complicated ...
episodes.overview: Dannielle and Nathalia confront Garrick about his use of dating apps; April and Danielle Davis have an emotional heart-to-heart; The Salahuddins learn upsetting news about Keisha; after being stood up, the Ryans hit the road to surprise Stephanie.

episodes.name: Seeking Commitment
episodes.overview: The Merrifields prepare to propose to Nathalia and the Salahuddins blindside Naeem's mother with unexpected news.

episodes.name: Seeking Answers
episodes.overview: The Davises decide if they're ready to start dating again and the Salahuddins go on a date with a much younger woman.

episodes.name: Seeking the Unexpected
episodes.overview: The Ryans meet with a new potential sister wife. Shane Sherwood worries he'll lose Ashley to another woman. Nick Davis anxiously waits to see if his wives are ready to start dating. After a month apart, Dannielle calls Garrick with shocking news.

episodes.name: Seeking a Silver Lining
episodes.overview: Dannielle arrives in Brazil to attend Garrick and Nathalia's wedding and the Sherwoods ask potential sister wife Sara to be exclusive.

episodes.name: Seeking a Deeper Understanding
episodes.overview: The Merrifields meet Nathalia's friends and Dannielle reveals her true feelings to Nathalia.

episodes.name: Seeking a Connection
episodes.overview: Nick Davis had a beautiful first date with Jasmine. Sara, a potential sister-wife, throws a curve ball to the Sherwoods.

episodes.name: Seeking Common Ground
episodes.overview: The Merrifields welcome a potential sister wife without Nathalia's knowledge. The Davises' bed faces a test when Jasmine visits for a sleepover.

episodes.name: Seeking Our Forever
episodes.overview: Garrick's potential sister wife Mariam sends mixed signals. Nathalia expresses her feelings clearly. After Jasmine's sleepover, the Davises face a major decision.
